posts.post_content:
Quite a few cards for sale. It's a work in progress as I have a bunch of non-graded T206s and T205s I will be putting up in the next week or so. Shipping is free, money orders and checks are fine, but if using Paypal, please add 3%.

Martin Neal
356 Squirrel Path
Charlottesville, Va. 22901

PP address  [url]lmneal4@aol.com[/url]

Thanks for looking!

I will be leaving for Alabama tonight but will have laptop with me. Or you can call me at 434-825-6792

Cards can be viewed at the following address.

I'll take the Bender Cycle 460.

Sending email.

Thanks,

Jerry
on several SGC's
I would take the T206 Alperman SGC 60 pending the price. Thank you.
Email sent on Snodgrass and Needham SGCs.
E-mail sent. Thanks, Brian

Martin,

I sent an email on 4 of them.  Thanks!

Andy
PM sent. Thanks, Dave

Hi Martin

PM sent for two of the SGC T206s.

Thanks

Jantz

Email sent on T206 Bransfield SGC50.  If still available, I would love to purchase it.

Thanks,
Phil

email sent on Lundgren chicago and schulte front view.

Tony

hi martin
email sent on the pelty horiz and pattee cards
thanks drew

Email sent yesterday regarding many cards.

Chris :)
pm sent on Sullivan
PM sent yesterday on multiple cards, thanks.

Martin,

Had sent a PM and email.  Do I need to resend?

Respectfully,

Dave

i'll take the t206 cobb bat off sgc 40, as agreed.
payment has been completed.
thanks again!

Beautiful collection, particularly among the SGC cards. Sorry to see you splitting it up; hope you had a good chance to enjoy it.

Noticed there were no prices by the Chase cards (blue portrait and trophy).  Are they for sale?  Can e-mail or PM me if they are, as I'd be interested.

Thanks,
--S

...to me!
the card arrived today but i wanted to send out a very special thank you to martin for spending almost $20 out of his own pocket to ensure that my ty cobb arrived safely in time for the holiday.
am now looking forward to introducing mr. cobb to his new companions.
thank you martin, and merry christmas to all!

Many Thanks Martin for the fast turn around.  Guiheen card arrived safely in time for Christmas.. Wishing all a Most Happy and Safe Holiday.

Dave

hi martin
pm sent
thanks
drew
Email sent on 2 Donlins, the Clarke and the Joss.  Merry Xmas!

Merry Christmas Martin

I sent you a PM two weeks ago, but never heard back from you. I'm still interested in the Sullivan & Ball (Cleveland) Old Mill if they are still available.

Thanks

Jantz

Hi Jantz,

   I thought I had sent you an email, as I marked the Sullivan as sold. I did get a few emails bounce back to me and I apologize if yours was one of them. 

Martin
PM sent, and an email.

[quote name="martin neal" post=857790]I did get a few emails bounce backMartin[/QUOTE]

Martin, 

Maybe my Dec 15 email was one of those that bounced back.  I'll try email again and send a PM on 2 of the SGC t206's.

Tony

Martin,

Got the 2 Donlin's and the Kelley in the mail today.  Thanks!  Great looking cards.
Email sent on chase sgc 88
